name: Temtem Clothing Previewer
description:
Hi!

First of all, almost all of this previewer assets belongs to Crema Games game Temtem, and not mine at all. (Just the shader used on the materials is mine)

This is a tool to preview all the cosmetics available in the game, being able to equip any available dye too. Just to make sure that dyes and cosmetics are of your liking before spending some pansuns on them ^^

Im only going to add the available in game ones. Im wont be adding unreleased until crema release them (xD). 

Um sorry, the only exception was the wings, so coool x)

For any problem or not added cosmetic, leave it on the comment section below, or on the version devlog comments ^^ (Currently no devlog sry bois)

Have a good day!
